summary.span: 为关联的 键和 值的集合（可通过键或索引来访问它）提供 基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for a collection of associated keys and values that can be accessed either with the key or with the index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的基础结构是一个哈希表。The underlying structure for this class is a hash table. 每个元素都是一个键/值对。Each element is a key/value pair. 的容量 是可容纳的元素数 。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 向添加元素时，会 根据需要通过重新分配来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻实例中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the instance. 默认哈希代码提供程序为 。The default hash code provider is the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 默认比较器为 。The default comparer is the . 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 中，此类使用区分区域性的字符串比较。In .NET Framework version 1.0, this class uses culture-sensitive string comparisons. 但是，在 .NET Framework 版本1.1 及更高版本中，此类在 比较字符串时使用。However, in .NET Framework version 1.1 and later, this class uses when comparing strings. 有关区域性如何影响比较和排序的详细信息，请参阅 [执行 Culture-Insensitive 字符串操作](/dotnet/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations)。For more information about how culture affects comparisons and sorting, see [Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations](/dotnet/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations). `null` 允许作为键或值。`null` is allowed as a key or as a value. > [!CAUTION] > `null` 由于找不到指定的键，并且 `null` 因为与键关联的值为，因此方法不区分返回的 `null` 。The method does not distinguish between `null` which is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` which is returned because the value associated with the key is `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现和使用 类。The following code example shows how to implement and use the class. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CPP/nameobjectcollectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CS/nameobjectcollectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/VB/nameobjectcollectionbase.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类型) 成员 Visual Basic 的公共静态 (是线程安全的。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不会为 (线程安全) 包装提供同步 ，但派生类可以使用属性创建其自己的同步版本 。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 枚举集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

related.span: 执行不区分区域性的字符串操作

span.span: Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量 是可容纳的元素数 。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 当向添加元素时 ，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量后，无需在将元素添加到时执行多个大小调整操作 。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻实例中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the instance. 默认哈希代码提供程序为 。The default hash code provider is the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 默认比较器为 。The default comparer is the . 此构造函数是一个 O (1) 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量 是可容纳的元素数 。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 当向添加元素时 ，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量后，无需在将元素添加到时执行多个大小调整操作 。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 哈希代码提供程序密密麻麻实例中的键的哈希代码 。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the instance. 默认哈希代码提供程序为 。The default hash code provider is the . 比较器确定两个键是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 默认比较器为 。The default comparer is the . 此构造函数是一个 O (`n`) 操作，其中， `n` 为 `capacity` 。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 已等于容量，则会 自动重新分配内部数组，并将现有元素复制到新数组，然后再添加新的元素。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果 小于容量，则此方法是 O (1) 操作。If is less than the capacity, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果需要增加容量以容纳新元素，则此方法将成为) 操作的 O (`n` ，其中， `n` 为 。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用通过 中的元素创建一个新 的 。The following code example uses to create a new with elements from an . span.span: An that represents the value of the first entry with the specified key, if found; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合包含多个具有指定键的项，则此方法只返回第一个项。If the collection contains multiple entries with the specified key, this method returns only the first entry. 若要获取具有相同键的后续项的值，请使用枚举器循环访问集合并比较键。To get the values of subsequent entries with the same key, use the enumerator to iterate through the collection and compare the keys. > [!CAUTION] > 如果找不到指定的键，则此方法 `null` 在以下情况下返回： 1) ; 如果找到指定的键，则为 2) ; 如果找到指定的值，则为 2 `null` 。This method returns `null` in the following cases: 1) if the specified key is not found; and 2) if the specified key is found and its associated value is `null`. 此方法不区分这两种情况。This method does not distinguish between the two cases. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 和 获取特定的键和值。The following code example uses and to get specific keys and values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不 包含具有指定键的元素，则将 保持不变。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 不会引发异常。No exception is thrown. 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 和 从中移除元素 。The following code example uses and to remove elements from a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove/CPP/nocb_baseremove.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove/CS/nocb_baseremove.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove/VB/nocb_baseremove.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取包含在 实例中的键/值对的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of key/value pairs contained in the instance.

value.span: 包含在 实例中的键/值对的数目。

span.span: The number of key/value pairs contained in the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是可存储的元素数 。The capacity is the number of elements that the can store. 实际在中的元素的数目 。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 容量始终大于或等于 。The capacity is always greater than or equal to . 如果在 添加元素时超出容量，则会自动重新分配内部数组，然后再复制旧元素并添加新元素，从而自动增加容量。If exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator
abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator

summary.span: 返回循环访问 的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此枚举器将集合的键作为字符串返回。This enumerator returns the keys of the collection as strings. C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回 `false` 。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用 返回 `false` ， 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 该枚举数不具有独占访问集合的权限；因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，通过该值指示 实例是否为只读的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the instance is read-only.

value.span: 如果 实例为只读，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the instance is read-only; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 只读集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个只读集合。The following code example creates a read-only collection. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly/CPP/nocb_isreadonly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly/CS/nocb_isreadonly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly/VB/nocb_isreadonly.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Keys As NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示对 对象的访问是否同步（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the object is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 对象的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the object is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象不同步。A object is not synchronized. 派生类可以使用属性提供的同步版本 。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the using the property. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the property during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

value.span: 一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类可以使用属性提供自己的类同步版本 。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the class using the property. 同步代码必须对对象的属性执行操作 ，而不是直接对对象执行操作 。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the property of the object, not directly on the object. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改对象的其他线程保持正确的同步 。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在 整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
